### Additional Details & Logs

- Kong version (`$ kong version`)
- Kong debug-level startup logs (`$ kong start --vv`)
- Kong error logs (`<KONG_PREFIX>/logs/error.log`)
- Kong configuration (registered APIs/Plugins & configuration file)
